name: Batlight
description:
PLEASE CLICK ON GAME WINDOW TO START!
(itch it's something wrong with you)

 --   1 MINUTE of gameplay!   --

SPACE - ATTACK
UP ARROW - JUMP & FLY (press many times)
ESC - PAUSE


BATLIGHT

Batlight is a platform-runner game that will make you die again and again (evil laugh here) I put my experiences, emotions and thoughts into this game and I hope you will find  your own meaning in it.  

Development and links 

I made this game in a couple of months just for fun. It’s my first game project where I was designing, drawing and developing everything by myself.
